message: How can I close the box and refresh the site to toggle that you're logged in? This isn't 100% javascript but I suspect that it's involved in the solution.

I have a page that uses http://www.p51labs.com/lightwindow/ - where I have a link on default.aspx that opens a lightwindow box with an iframe aimed at login.aspx. Login.aspx uses SAML as single sign-on and redirects the use to a third-party domain where they login and are then redirected back to my Default.aspx.
But the box is still opened and is at Default.aspx. That is, you end up at Default.aspx, with a lightwindow box that has Default.aspx loaded inside an iframe.
use this to reload the parent window, once they are logged in.
Okay, I got most of it working!
Now I'm trying close the lightwindow from inside its own iFrame.

if you have a working close function in the parent window:

window.parent.closethewindow();
